html: Grateful for the opportunity to visit with @realDonaldTrump and @VP Pence today. They were gracious in welcoming me to the U.S. Senate and I am committed to supporting their conservative agenda.

html: It is a great honor to serve Mississippi as its first female U.S. Senator. I am ready to hit the ground running, and do everything I can to represent Mississippians well.pic.twitter.com/1k2pk4QLf2
